name: 王泰典
objective:
Help students to develop comprehensive understanding of rock behavior and associated mechanical model which is appropriate for describing its behavior.  In addition, to employ the model for rock engineering
介紹岩石基本力學特性與概念的力學模型，並透過其在工程應用分析方法與案例之探討，使學習者對於岩石力學在岩體工程的應用，具有一貫性的瞭解與邏輯性的思考

scorePolicy:
Homework: ~35%
15-20 exercises approximately
Due: Two weeks after assignment. Delay is not allowed

Site practices: ~20%
1-2 site exercise(s)
1-3 students in a group

Midterm & Final: ~30%

Attendance: 15%
Presence & Response
